message: Hello! I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a product from me. As you may know, I have a track record of selling products, and 4 out of the 4 products I've sold so far have been high-quality. I'm confident that this product will be just as exceptional. Would you like to take a chance and make a purchase?
I trust your past performance and believe in the quality of your products. I'd like to make a purchase.

Welcome! I'm glad to see another interested buyer. I want to be transparent with you - I've had a streak of good luck with my previous products, but I'm not perfect. In fact, I've just had a low-quality product in my last sale. I'm not trying to hide anything, but I want to give you a realistic expectation. Would you like to take a chance and purchase this product, knowing that it might not be as exceptional as my previous ones?
Thank you for being transparent, Alice. Given the statistics and your honesty, I am willing to take the risk and purchase the product.

Hi there! I'm glad you're interested in my product. I want to remind you that my previous two sales were both low-quality products. This might be a pattern, and I don't want to sugarcoat it. However, I still believe that I have a good chance of selling a high-quality product eventually. Would you like to take a chance and purchase this product, knowing that the odds are against it being high-quality?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Given the statistics and the risk involved, I prefer to pass on this opportunity.
